meanings.definition: A type of antelope native to southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The springboks gracefully roamed the savannah.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of springboks while on safari.
meanings.sent3: The springboks decided to have a race with the zebras for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as swift and agile as a springbok.
meanings.sent5: The springboks' distinctive jumping behavior caught my attention.

meanings.definition: The national animal of South Africa.
meanings.sent1: The springboks symbolize the spirit of South Africa.
meanings.sent2: Children in South Africa learn about the springboks in school.
meanings.sent3: The springboks in the zoo proudly represented their country.
meanings.sent4: The springboks' image was proudly displayed on the national flag.
meanings.sent5: Seeing the springboks in the wild filled me with national pride.

meanings.definition: The South African national rugby team.
meanings.sent1: The springboks played a thrilling match against New Zealand.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered loudly for the springboks at the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The springboks surprised everyone with their new team strategy.
meanings.sent4: The springboks tackled their opponents with determination.
meanings.sent5: Watching the springboks win the championship was a memorable experience.
